meanings.definition: The act of dividing or separating something into parts or sections.
meanings.sent1: The partitioning of the cake into slices was done carefully.
meanings.sent2: The partitioning of the room with curtains created a sense of privacy.
meanings.sent3: The partitioning of the puzzle pieces made it easier to solve.
meanings.sent4: The partitioning of responsibilities among team members ensured efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The partitioning of the garden into flower beds added beauty to the landscape.

meanings.definition: The process of creating partitions or divisions within a space or system.
meanings.sent1: The partitioning of the hard drive allowed for better organization of files.
meanings.sent2: The partitioning of the office cubicles improved workflow.
meanings.sent3: The partitioning of the classroom into study areas helped students focus.
meanings.sent4: The partitioning of the city into districts simplified governance.
meanings.sent5: The partitioning of the bookshelves by genre made it easier to find books.
